lead_paragraph: Now in its fifth year, the New York Art Book Fair, which runs at P.S. 1 from Nov. 5 to Nov. 7, hosts over 200 local and international publishers showcasing rare books, new books, zines, digital media and publications of all sorts. Below are some of our favorites.
snippet: The Moment selects some of our favorite publishers at the New York Art Book Fair, which opens this weekend at P.S. 1.
abstract: The Moment selects some of our favorite publishers at the New York Art Book Fair, which opens this weekend at P.S. 1.
